Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on his friendship with a thief called Musashi, the film takes place at the beginning of the Showa period when Japan was undergoing rapid change from Meiji era isolationism to globalised modernity. I could tell that the people working behind the scenes really cared about their film. They may not have been millions of dollars rich or famous as big studio directors are but they really cared about their work. You can tell every frame of this movie is seen through a lens with love and care from start to finish.
